4307830.name: 爆走!!おそうじカート
4307830.description:
Take control of the 'Cleaning Cart' and clean up a city covered in filth! But watch out for the Litterbugs who scatter trash everywhere!
Faster, cleaner, better. This is a score-attack car action game.

Story

A near-future world. While civilization has advanced, people's hearts have decayed, and the city is overflowing with mud and garbage...
In this crisis, the cleaning company Be-Bygones rises up. They develop the next-generation cleaning cart that converts garbage into energy!
As a new employee, you will take on cleaning missions in the devastated city with this state-of-the-art cart. Polish the city to a shine and purify the Litterbugs along the way!

Three Satisfying Mechanics

1. Compete with rivals in high-speed cleaning!
You have 3 minutes. How efficiently and quickly can you clean the city? Find your own strategies with simple yet deep route planning! Compete for high scores with friends and rivals nationwide.

2. Burn trash for a boost! Eco-Cyclone!
Collecting trash fills your gauge. Use it to activate the 'Eco-Cyclone'! Dash through the city and suck up trash in a wide area!

3. Purify the Litterbugs!
The villains dirtying the city, the 'Litterbugs'. They're technically civilians, so running them over is a penalty. But with the Eco-Cyclone, you can suck them up and purify both body and soul! Earn a huge score bonus!
